verses.verse: לַ֭מְנַצֵּחַ <WH5329> To the chief Musician עַל־ <WH5921> and שׁוּשַׁ֣ן עֵד֑וּת <WH7802> upon Shushaneduth מִכְתָּ֖ם <WH4387> Michtam לְדָוִ֣ד <WH1732> of David לְלַמֵּֽד׃ <WH3925> to teach בְּהַצּוֹת֨וֹ ׀ <WH5327> when he strove אֶ֥ת <WH854> for אֲרַ֣ם נַהֲרַיִם֮ <WH763> Aham-naharaim וְאֶת־ <WH854> for אֲרַ֪ם צ֫וֹבָ֥ה <WH760> and with Aramzobah וַיָּ֤שָׁב <WH7725> returned יוֹאָ֗ב <WH3097> when Joab וַיַּ֣ךְ <WH5221> and smote אֶת־ <WH853> אֱד֣וֹם <WH123> of Edom בְּגֵיא־ <WH1516> in the valley מֶ֑לַח <WH4417> of salt שְׁנֵ֖ים <WH8147> both עָשָׂ֣ר <WH6240> ten אָֽלֶף׃ <WH505> thousand אֱ֭לֹהִים <WH430> O God זְנַחְתָּ֣נוּ <WH2186> thou hast cast us off פְרַצְתָּ֑נוּ <WH6555> thou hast scattered אָ֝נַ֗פְתָּ <WH599> us thou hast been displeased תְּשׁ֣וֹבֵ֥ב <WH7725> O turn thyself to us again לָֽנוּ׃

הִרְעַ֣שְׁתָּה <WH7493> to tremble אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> Thou hast made the earth פְּצַמְתָּ֑הּ <WH6480> thou hast broken רְפָ֖ה <WH7495> it heal שְׁבָרֶ֣יהָ <WH7667> the breaches כִי־ <WH3588> for מָֽטָה׃ <WH4131> thereof for it shaketh

הִרְאִ֣יתָה <WH7200> Thou hast shewed עַמְּךָ֣ <WH5971> thy people קָשָׁ֑ה <WH7186> hard things הִ֝שְׁקִיתָ֗נוּ <WH8248> thou hast made us to drink יַ֣יִן <WH3196> the wine תַּרְעֵלָֽה׃ <WH8653> of astonishment

נָ֘תַ֤תָּה <WH5414> Thou hast given לִּירֵאֶ֣יךָ <WH3373> to them that fear נֵּ֭ס <WH5251> a banner לְהִתְנוֹסֵ֑ס <WH5127> thee that it may be displayed מִ֝פְּנֵ֗י <WH6440> because קֹ֣שֶׁט <WH7189> of the truth סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Selah

לְ֭מַעַן <WH4616> because of יֵחָלְצ֣וּן <WH2502> may be delivered יְדִידֶ֑יךָ <WH3039> That thy beloved הוֹשִׁ֖יעָה <WH3467> save יְמִֽינְךָ֣ <WH3225> [with] thy right hand [וַעֲנֵנוּ כ] (וַעֲנֵֽנִי׃ <WH6032> answer ק)

אֱלֹהִ֤ים ׀ <WH430> God דִּבֶּ֥ר <WH1696> hath spoken בְּקָדְשׁ֗וֹ <WH6944> in his holiness אֶ֫עְלֹ֥זָה <WH5937> I will rejoice אֲחַלְּקָ֥ה <WH2505> I will divide שְׁכֶ֑ם <WH7927> Shechem וְעֵ֖מֶק <WH6010> the valley סֻכּ֣וֹת <WH5523> of Succoth אֲמַדֵּֽד׃ <WH4058> and mete out

לִ֤י גִלְעָ֨ד ׀ <WH1568> Gilead וְלִ֬י מְנַשֶּׁ֗ה <WH4519> [is] mine and Manasseh וְ֭אֶפְרַיִם <WH669> [is] mine Ephraim מָע֣וֹז <WH4581> also [is] the strength רֹאשִׁ֑י <WH7218> of mine head יְ֝הוּדָ֗ה <WH3063> Judah מְחֹֽקְקִי׃ <WH2710> [is] my lawgiver

מוֹאָ֤ב ׀ <WH4124> Moab סִ֬יר <WH5518> caldron רַחְצִ֗י <WH7366> is My washbowl עַל־ <WH5921> Over אֱ֭דוֹם <WH123> over Edom אַשְׁלִ֣יךְ <WH7993> will I cast out נַעֲלִ֑י <WH5275> my shoe עָ֝לַ֗י <WH5921> because פְּלֶ֣שֶׁת <WH6429> Philistia הִתְרֹעָֽעִֽי׃ <WH7321> triumph
מִ֣י <WH4310> Who יֹ֭בִלֵנִי <WH2986> Who will bring עִ֣יר <WH5892> Ai מָצ֑וֹר <WH4692> me [into] the strong מִ֖י <WH4310> Who נָחַ֣נִי <WH5148> will lead עַד־ <WH5704> against אֱדֽוֹם׃ <WH123> Edom

הֲלֹֽא־ <WH3808> not אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> Yourself אֱלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> [Wilt] not thou O God זְנַחְתָּ֑נוּ <WH2186> [which] hadst cast us off וְֽלֹא־ <WH3808> not תֵצֵ֥א <WH3318> [which] didst not go out אֱ֝לֹהִ֗ים <WH430> ? and [thou] O God בְּצִבְאוֹתֵֽינוּ׃ <WH6635> our armies
הָֽבָה־ <WH3051> Give לָּ֣נוּ עֶזְרָ֣ת <WH5833> us help מִצָּ֑ר <WH6862> from trouble וְ֝שָׁ֗וְא <WH7723> for vain תְּשׁוּעַ֥ת <WH8668> [is] the help אָדָם׃ <WH120> of man
בֵּֽאלֹהִ֥ים <WH430> Through God נַעֲשֶׂה־ <WH6213> we shall do חָ֑יִל <WH2428> valiantly וְ֝ה֗וּא <WH1931> who יָב֥וּס <WH947> for he [it is that] shall tread down צָרֵֽינוּ׃ <WH6862> our enemies
